page.title: 19TRANSPORT-ROSE GREEN
page.content: The roads in this area are minor roads,usually only one lane in each direction.There are far more cars than lorries on the roads here because it is a more residential than industrial area.Lorries come here mainly to deliver goods,such as food and other stock for shops,and building materials.Large articulated lorries are rarely seen.Journeys to work and for shopping are usually taken by car, the largest number coming from Pagham. Bus services are very restricted.A school bus is available for older children attending school in Chichester.Bicycles are popular with all age groups.
